data.title: J. M. Coetzee – Prize presentation
data.meta_description: The Nobel Prize in Literature 2003 was awarded to John M. Coetzee "who in innumerable guises portrays the surprising involvement of the outsider"
data.text:
J. M. Coetzee

Prize presentation

Your browser does not support the video tag.

Watch a video clip of the 2003 Nobel Laureate in Literature, J. M. Coetzee, receiving his Nobel Prize medal and diploma during the Nobel Prize Award Ceremony at the Concert Hall in Stockholm, Sweden, on 10 December 2003.

To cite this section
